animeDescription: The short film's main character is a water spider who seems to have fallen in love with a water strider. Though she is scared of him at first, the water strider soon gets used to the presence of the spider. (Source: Wikipedia)
animeStaff: [['Miyazaki, Hayao', 'Director, Script'], ['Yonebayashi, Hiromasa', 'Key Animation'], ['Yasuda, Michiyo', 'Color Design'], ['Satou, Masako', 'Key Animation']]
